description:
Erik landed on my lap...uh..doorstep, just in time to help balance the site with some nice body hair.
We did some photos with him extra scruffy, and then we trimmed him up with lighter scruff action. Either way he is smokin hot!
Erik says he wants to do some adult work, so I am gonna see if I can hook him up with one of the boys. He says he is versatile, but likely more a bottom, and I have a line of straight boys wanting to top. He's gonna be very busy!
So for you guys crying out for more mature hairy guys, it's time to stop writing me!
title: Erik - Solo
